issue.title: [CF 265] Icon event On alpha change
issue.body:
TMW Version: >=r165
This event don't support 0% to 100% or 100% to 0%.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #265 | Raw

comments.body:
These are handled by the OnShow and OnHide events. There was an error in implementation in the first few revisions that made it possible for them to handle X% -> 0% or 0% - > X%.  Just set the OnShow and OnHide events to play the same sound

Edited Jul 22, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
